name: Tri (itch) (Tri_Developer)
description:
WAD: Movement

Left Click: Sword

Right Click: Shrunken Throw

----------------------------------------------------------------

You don't know who you are...

You don't know where you are...

You don't know what kind of creature you are...

You don't know anything...

All you know is that you need to find information...

Game mechanics:

Things that are safe are black or dark grey.

Things that can harm you are grey or light grey.

Safe places are white.
